about_the_game:
Welcome to the PURE FUCKING RAGE Public Test Demo! A game where you survive waves of enemies, collect their blood, and grow stronger! This game is in early development, currently in a public testing phase. It is missing a lot of Art Assets and will receive gameplay changes over time! 

Your goal is simple:

Grow stronger! Using the blood of your fallen enemies, purchase weapons and abilities, all of which grant new ways to play and battle your foes!

Demo Key Features!

  • Includes an Arena GameMode that features endless waves of never-ending enemies, escalation and boss waves!

  • 19 Weapons to collect over 6 categories!

  • The ability to create weapon loadouts to save your favorite playstyles!

  • 15 Skills to learn and upgrade yourself, changing how far you can go and how you play!

  • A Challenges system with Random, Daily and Weekly challenges to test your skills!

  • 7+ Maps to fight your battles across!

  • An Offering System to change weather across maps!

  • And much more!

More free updates and content will arrive over time featuring tweaks, new weapons, skills, maps, brand new gameplay mechanics and features, updated visuals, and so much more! See you in Ashburn City! 

What is Public Test Demos?

The public test demo is a way for me to test out the game and to see what works and what doesn't work! Right now the game is in a very early state; a lot of things are WIP and missing art assets! I intend to release multiple free test builds of the game, using the feedback generated to improve the game until I deem it ready for an Early Access release!

content_descriptors.notes: The game is revolves around violence, killing and collecting blood. Narrated Storylines include references to criminal activity, physical and graphic violence, drug use, and references to genocide. Animated 2d Cutscenes also include violent and graphic imagery as well.

name: PURE FUCKING RAGE Public Test Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
  • VR Support: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
